title: I thil tihsual rawn kalpui la
lyrics:
I thil tihsual rawn kalpui la,
I lungngaihna zawng zawng nen;
Hmangaih tui thukah inbual la,
Hahdamna I hmu ngei ang.

Hmanhmawh langin, eng nge I muan?
Engah nge I thlaray a boral ang?
Isuan a chhandam duh a che,
Zahngaihna a pe ang che.

I sual chung hian rawn pa thuai la,
Isua Kristan a nghak che;
Eng anga sual pawh ni mah la,
Vur angin I var leh ang.

Chhandamtu'n a sawmna thu chu,
Inchhira awih duhte leh,
Amah chu ring duh apiangten,
Chatuan nunna an hmu ang.

Damna chang turin lo kal la,
A aw nem chu ngaihthla la;
Mi sual lo kir leh duh apiang,
Angel - hovin an lawm ang.
